list_definition.definition: an imaginary area of the sky within which the sun, moon, and planets move. It contains 12 constellations known as the signs of the zodiac. Astrologers believe that these influence a person’s character and life depending on the star’s position when he/she was born

list_ex_of_english: They are occasionally referred to as crosses because each modality forms a cross when drawn across the zodiac.
Upon this the signs of the zodiac are superimposed.
At the base a painted figure of a zodiacal man showed the relationship between the signs of the zodiac and parts of the human body.
Shigure is one of the oldest members of the zodiac.
The signs of the zodiac are carved in wood on the ceiling.
While most tourist ships try to co-operate to minimise the disturbance to wildlife, it is difficult when zodiac landing craft are ferrying hundreds of eager tourists to the shoreline.
The ayanamsha describes the increasing gap between the tropical and sidereal zodiacs.
The charts are based on the constellations of the twelve zodiac signs.
